author: Adam K. Raymond
title: Trump: Expel Congressman From GOP for Threatening to Hold Up Stimulus Vote
description: Kentucky congressman Thomas Massie has drawn Trump’s ire for saying he may force a roll-call vote on the coronavirus stimulus package.
content:
